name: 楊元森
objective: This is a fundamental C/C++ programming language course. The topics covered in this course includes basic programming skills of C and C++, objects, classes, control statements, functions, arrays, pointers, strings, data abstraction, operator overloading, inheritance, and polymorphism.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Programming Design
  Installation of C/C++ compiler
Week 2: How to build a Hello-World project
  Unit conversion
Week 3: Introduction to C++. Basic standard output (cout).
  How to print / what would be printed
Week 4: Variables, basic operators
 Variables, basic operators, unit conversion
Week 5: Control Statements: if, else
Week 6: Control Statements: do-while repetitions
Week 7: Control Statements Practices
Week 8: Control Statements: for repetitions
Week 9: Loop exercise
Week 10: Midterm 
Week 11: Functions
Week 12: Arrays
Week 13: Multidimensional Arrays
Week 14: Pointers
Week 15: Sequential-Access Files
Week 16: Classes
Week 17: Final Simulation 
Week 18: Final
scorePolicy:
Class tests: 25%
Midterm: 25%
Final: 50%
---
1. 不遲到,不早退,遵守上課秩序,不打瞌睡,親自簽到. 
2. 無故缺席者，第一次總成績失分 10 分，第二次 20 分 。無故缺席達三次的同學，將從點名單中移除。
3. 3. 遲到, 早退, 秩序不好, 打瞌睡被點到, 上課完FB或其它非關課程之上網動作被抓到, 每次總成績失分 5 分。

注意事項1：課程中若發生違背誠實原則的行為 (作業抄襲, 小考舞弊, 代簽到退等)，學期成績將不及格，且不予寬容。

注意事項2：因故無法上課的同學，事假需事先提出請假文件，病喪假需於事儘快提出請假文件，否則不授予第1項分數。
